verses.name: Psalms 119:49
verses.text: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

verses.name: Psalms 119:50
verses.text: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.

verses.name: Psalms 119:51
verses.text: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.

verses.name: Psalms 119:52
verses.text: I remembered thy judgments of old, O Lord; and have comforted myself.

verses.name: Psalms 119:53
verses.text: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.

verses.name: Psalms 119:54
verses.text: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.

verses.name: Psalms 119:55
verses.text: I have remembered thy name, O Lord, in the night, and have kept thy law.
